name: Retrieve an existing order by id
scenarioId: petstore/get_order:Retrieve an existing order by id
methodName: Retrieve an existing order by id

testSteps.description: 1: Retrieve an existing order by id ({id=2, petId=5, quantity=3, shipDate=2024-06-15T10:00:00.556+0000, status=delivered, complete=true})

children.description:
Given the order exists with:
| id | petId | quantity | shipDate | status | complete |
| 2 | 5 | 3 | 2024-06-15T10:00:00.556+0000 | delivered | true |
client executes a POST on the resource /store/order
POST https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 08 Jan 2026 21:35:40 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

children.description: When the client requests order with id "2"
client executes a GET on the resource /store/order/{id}
GET https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/store/order/2

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Date: Thu, 08 Jan 2026 21:35:40 GMT
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, DELETE, PUT
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: Content-Type, api_key, Authorization
Server: Jetty(9.2.9.v20150224)

children.description: Then the response status should be 200
And the response should include the order identifier 2
And the response should include the associated pet identifier 5
And the response should include the ordered quantity 3
And the response should include the shipping date "2024-06-15T10:00:00.556+0000"
And the response should include the order status "delivered"
And the response should indicate whether the order is completed "true"

userStory.narrative:
As a consumer of the API
  I want to retrieve orders by id and validate responses

title: Retrieve an existing order by id

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the order exists with:
When the client requests order with id "<id>"
Then the response status should be 200
And the response should include the order identifier <id>
And the response should include the associated pet identifier <petId>
And the response should include the ordered quantity <quantity>
And the response should include the shipping date "<shipDate>"
And the response should include the order status "<status>"
And the response should indicate whether the order is completed "<complete>"

scenarioOutline:
Given the order exists with:
|id | petId | quantity | shipDate | status | complete|
|<id> | <petId> | <quantity> | <shipDate> | <status> | <complete>|
When the client requests order with id "<id>"
Then the response status should be 200
And the response should include the order identifier <id>
And the response should include the associated pet identifier <petId>
And the response should include the ordered quantity <quantity>
And the response should include the shipping date "<shipDate>"
And the response should include the order status "<status>"
And the response should indicate whether the order is completed "<complete>"
